TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnitConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 從 物件轉換為另一種資料型別的物件，以及從另一種型別轉換為 物件。

span.span: Converts from a object to an object of another data type and from another type to a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別進行轉換另一種資料類型的物件。Use the class to convert a to an object of another data type. 您也可以使用另一個資料類型的物件轉換為類別。You can also use the class to convert an object of another data type to a . > [!NOTE] > 這個轉換子可以只將字串轉換為和為字串。This converter can convert only a string to and a to a string. > [!CAUTION] > 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反地，藉由呼叫適當的轉換程式。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

related.span: ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項和 CSS 樣式

span.span: ASP.NET Web Server Controls and CSS Styles
